fields.name: STICHTAG
fields.description: The [Reporting date] refers to the economic date to which the represented data apply. This means that the data record was obtained from the operational business systems on that date after the close of online activities and bookings. Format 'YYYYMMDD'.

fields.name: GESCHAEFT_ID
fields.description: Client specific unique identifier of a transaction.

fields.name: PARTNER_ID
fields.description: Client specific unique identifier of a partner.

fields.name: SICHERHEITENVEREINB_ID_LGD_SI
fields.description: Client specific unique identifier of a LGD collateral.Necessary to uniquely identify a LGD collateral (Primary keys: Collateral agreement ID LGD collateral

fields.name: EXPOSURE_CLASS_TRANSACTION
fields.description: Exposure class of the transaction - without taking into account the adjustments due to collateralisation.Reference: Article 112/ 147 CRR

fields.name: SL_VERARBEITUNG
fields.description: Internal processing key used by the calculation engine to cluster transactions based on their product category (e.g. KREDIT - on balance sheet credit transaction

fields.name: KATEGORIE_SICHERHEIT_LGD_SI
fields.description: This key clusters the different LGD collaterals (Financial collaterals

fields.name: INFRASTRUCTURE_SUPPORT_FACTOR
fields.description: nan

fields.name: SME_FACTOR
fields.description: SME supporting factor determined in accordance with Article 501 CRR. (The SME supporting factor reduces the RWA of transactions towards small and medium-sized enterprises.)

fields.name: CORRELATION_MULTIPLIER
fields.description: Correlation multiplier used in the RW formula for Banks/ Corporates. Possible values: 1

fields.name: RESTLAUFZEIT
fields.description: Residual maturity of the transaction  in days. The residual maturity is calculated in CE as [Date: End of transaction]  [Reporting date]

fields.name: URSPRUNGSWAEHRUNG
fields.description: Gives the original currency (ISO code) of the transaction

fields.name: URSPRUNGSLAUFZEIT
fields.description: Gives the original maturity of the transaction which is calculated as [Date: End of transaction] - [Date: Start of transaction]

fields.name: DAT_GESCGAEFTSENDE
fields.description: NO DESCRIPTION WAS FOUND

fields.name: HOPT
fields.description: NO DESCRIPTION WAS FOUND

fields.name: ORIG_EXPOSURE_PRE_CONV_FACTOR
fields.description: Basis for assessment for COREP purposes- before value adjustment/provisions (STC)- before EAD parameter (LEQ

fields.name: EAD
fields.description: Exposure at default (final)

fields.name: LGD_GESCHAEFTSBESTANDTEIL
fields.description: LGD (including downturn effects)of the transactions component considering existing collaterals (LGD collaterals + substitution collaterals)

fields.name: RISIKOAKTIVA
fields.description: Amount of the risk-weighted assets per transaction component

fields.name: ERWARTETER_VERLUST
fields.description: (Expected Loss) shows the absolute amount of the expected loss for the transaction component under observation.

fields.name: STICHTAG
fields.description: The [Reporting date] refers to the economic date to which the represented data apply. This means that the data record was obtained from the operational business systems on that date after the close of online activities and bookings. Format 'YYYYMMDD'.

fields.name: PARTNER_ID
fields.description: Client specific unique identifier of a partner.

fields.name: KZ_ZAHLUNGSVERZUG
fields.description: Relevant information in the STA approaches: If the Flag_Past_Due = 'J' then the partner/transaction is in default.Reference: Article 127 CRR

fields.name: PD_FINAL
fields.description: Final PD of the transaction component. The final PD is either the punctual PD ([PD punctual transaction component including PD add-ons]) or the PD class as derived via rule table [RT].[Class PD]

fields.name: SL_RISIKOLAND
fields.description: Risk country of the risk-partner of the transaction - without taking into account any collaterals.(corresponds to the ISO-Alpha-2 country code).

fields.name: RATINGVERFAHREN_ID
fields.description: The Rating procedure_ID facilitates a client-specific unique and detailed identification of all rating/scoring procedures used. This is necessary for a targeted controlling and analysis in the area of ratings/scorings. The ID is chosen by the client itself (6 characters).   In HVB AG

fields.name: SL_NACE
fields.description: The NACE-Code (Statistical Classification of Economic Activities in the European Community) is the industry standard classification system used in the European Union and gives the economic activity of the customer/ company.

fields.name: BETR_UNTERNEHMENSGROESSE
fields.description: Relevant information in the IRB approaches: The amount company size is used to distinguish between the asset classes corporate large and corporate small and is one input to calculate the risk weight for small corporates. The amount company size is filled according to the following rule: Turnover (if available) or Balance sheet total (if available) or Annual incomeReference: Article 153

fields.description: Client specific unique identifier of a LGD collateral.Necessary to uniquely identify a LGD collateral (Primary keys: Collateral agreement ID LGD collateral

fields.name: MARKTWERT
fields.description: Current market value of a derivative/ SFT transaction.
